      • getAdjacentChunks

        public static org.bukkit.Chunk[] getAdjacentChunks(org.bukkit.Location l)
        Gets adjacent chunks by location. It returns something like this: xxx xox xxx where 'o' is the location and 'x' are the adjacent chunks.
        Parameters:
        l - Location to inspect
        Returns:
        Array of adjacent chunks
